mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_TBL VALUES(#{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberPw2}, #{memberName}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberBirthday}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberAddress}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_TBL SET MEMBER_PW = #{memberPw}, MEMBER_PW2 = #{memberPw2}, MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname}, MEMBER_PHONE = #{memberPhone}, MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}, MEMBER_ADDRESS = #{memberAddress}, UPDATE_DATE = DEFAULT WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER_TBL WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_PW = #{memberPw}
